extendedInfo.description: Simply the most advanced mobile security out there. Protect your personal privacy with Cloud Antivirus, App Protector (app locking), Locator and much more. Featured in numerous places including TechCrunch, NetworkWorld, and InformationWeek.Businesses can secure all of their company devices and benefit from additional features like web security, network controls, and app controls. Learn more online at www.clutchmobile.com.With a FREE personal account enjoy the following features: - Antivirus - App Protector - Locator - Lock and Wipe a lost or stolen device - Sound an Alarm on a lost phone (even if volume is off) - Remote diagnostics - Robust website to guard privacy - Minimal battery impactIf you have a business, our unrivaled enterprise features will make managing and securing your devices simple. Business features include: - Dashboard detailing security status of all devices - App locking to restrict use of certain apps like Settings - Custom home screens set by admin - Web security to block malicious websites - Network controls - Device policies like password requirements - Device diagnostics - Remote wipe and lock - Private app market for employees - ReportingKeywords: Find My Phone, Antivirus, Anti virus, Malware, Trojan, Anti-virus, Lost Phone, Device Management, Phone Finder, Phone Locator, Virus Protection, Spyware, Erase Phone, Security, Mobile Security, Enterprise Security, company security, business security, Remote Locate, Device Find, App Lock, App Locking, App Protector, Lock apps, Lock applications, Web security, Network security, Internet security

reviews.title: Excellent App. Multiple Uses and Benefits
reviews.comment: Well made app. Lets you block adds, locate devices. I would really like to see an option to use the tor network.
reviews.author: Teb Tengri

reviews.title: A Winner! Impressive!

reviews.title: Reliable security
reviews.comment: Update: Really nice UI, esp for non-techies. Love the app protector feat. for keeping emails, etc. private if you let others use your device freely, adds an extra layer of security. But wish I could set diff PWs for diff apps.   Easy and straight forward interface makes it easy to locate, lock, scan for viruses or clear data on your mobile device.  Love the look of the app itself and the website.  A definite install for anyone who cares about keeping their mobile devices secure.  Thanks Clutch Mobile!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks really good, but can\'t get app lock to do anything
reviews.comment: I\'m never prompted for a pin, except when opening the lock settings. Using Asylum cm10.1 (4.2.1).  Was really hoping for a nice upgrade from App Protector. Would also prefer pattern lock, or a cleverly disguised number lock like Ultra Lock.
Incredibly useful!
reviews.author: Andrew Beanland
